channel.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Server Content Suggestions[/size][/b][/center]
I was wondering what makes certain servers more fun then others, and decided that I wanted to get the communities opinion on what they think makes up an awesome server. :eek:
There are a few basic questions, such as:
[ul][li]What is the primary reason you play private servers?[/li] [li]What makes you decide if you stay on a server, or logout and try another one?[/li] [li]What is your favorite feature that you have ever seen on a server?[/li] [li]What feature(s) would you like to see added to a server?[/li] [li]What is your favorite client version? (These include 317, 474, 508, 525, and 562.)[/li][/ul]
I might take the most creative and awesome features that you suggest and put them together in a server, so post anything you want! [center]For reference, here are screenshots of the different client versions: [b]317: [img]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/pics/blitz8c.jpg[/img]
474: [img]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/pics/474/full4.jpg[/img]
508/525: [img]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/pics/508/agf1.jpg[/img]
562: [img]http://www.allgofree.org/blitz/pics/blitz_562.jpg[/img] [/b] [/center]

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:24, topic:332354”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=428790.msg3148156#msg3148156 date=1268273235]

[quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=428790.msg3147881#msg3147881 date=1268259007]if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ry60003333")) { sendMessage("Fuck you, buddy."); } else { sendMessage("<3"); }
[/quote]
are you daft?
else what? No matter what it’s just going to print fuck you.

[/quote]

Umm from what i see there is a “!” which means Not, So it basicailly in english is:-
If you name is not Ry60003333 than “Fuck you, buddy” but if you are Ry60003333 then
“<3”[/quote]
He fixed it, look at when I quoted it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

What is the primary reason you play private servers?
Pk’ing, i hate rs, boredom, skilling, having fun, also something to do

What makes you decide if you stay on a server, or logout and try another one?

Ill leave if:

its a delta,
if rares are sold in a shop,
if combat blows,
if xp rate is 2-4 times rs,
if owner and ranks are corrupt,
if commands are enabled,
if there are a million customs,
if its using a variation of bluurs client,
if the added animations and custom images are larger then the cache,
if the owner is an idiot and update the client everyday and makes you re -dl the client because he is too dumb for an update server,
if it disconnects every 10 minutes for a restart,
and finally if there are pathetic fixes for duping.

What is your favorite feature that you have ever seen on a server?

combat system, and stability

What feature(s) would you like to see added to a server?

stability, an attempt to not only recreate old rs but add somewhat new and original features without destroying the game it was, and in terms of features, full skills, and some minigames

What is your favorite client version? (These include 317, 474, 508, 525, and 562.)

474 or 562 has the most potential, but myself i prefer 317, its clean and simple, and doesnt have a 40-60 mb download.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

What is the primary reason you play private servers?
I play cause RS died in 07 and servers replace the feel 07 left behind

What makes you decide if you stay on a server, or logout and try another one?
When i log in and theres more than one player online and staff is nice

What is your favorite feature that you have ever seen on a server?
Skill cape emotes ive never seen it

What feature(s) would you like to see added to a server?
Working skill cape emotes, No 508+ items, a NON-delta combat system

What is your favorite client version? (These include 317, 474, 508, 525, and 562.)
474

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

All these suggestions have been awesome so far, and keep them up! It seems like people mainly want the server to have minigames, great PKing, great stability, and awesome staff. So this is what I’m going for right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

What is the primary reason you play private servers?

Good skilling, something to do while i bot on rs.

What makes you decide if you stay on a server, or logout and try another one?

Good owner, good realistic skills and economy and skillcapes.

What is your favorite feature that you have ever seen on a server?

Good skilling

What feature(s) would you like to see added to a server?

Epic realistic hard skilling, with fully working cape emotes.

What is your favorite client version? (These include 317, 474, 508, 525, and 562.)

Um, either 474 or 525.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

What is the primary reason you play private servers?

Because they have nice features, such as very realistic pking, good economy server, doesn’t have ANY custom items, etc.

What makes you decide if you stay on a server, or logout and try another one?

If the owner is retarded, and none of the staff are helpful, I’ll leave. I stay if it is easy to get started on the server.

What is your favorite feature that you have ever seen on a server?

Excellent pking.

What feature(s) would you like to see added to a server?

Realistic pking, moderate exp rates, good economy. Basically that’s all I care about.

What is your favorite client version? (These include 317, 474, 508, 525, and 562.)

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

offtopic -
fuck off with the retarded code pasting.

ontopic -

  1. I actually don’t, none of them are made well enough or managed properly
  2. If I found a server with a smart owner who can make good decisions, I would probably stay. So long as the server stays fun.
  3. Well made, balanced combat
  4. If the server was 317, I would like to see the good aspects of that version, not importing models and maps from other versions, etc
  5. 317

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Main feature I like in a server has to be Skilling/Pking…

I like the feeling of earning a stat(Hard Work) of getting that stat to max, wearing that Skillcape, then running around with it, then the servers where rares are actually rare. I like the feeling of buying a Party Hat or Santa, putting it on and having a sense of accomplishment. Servers where you get on, spawn crap, get max stats… Is plain stupid. There should be a way to show who is better then the other person.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:15, topic:332354”][quote author=Adam link=topic=428790.msg3147917#msg3147917 date=1268259695]
Good luck. Many have said they would create those and never do.
[/quote]
I’ve been working on this for about three years now, and its going to work perfectly.[/quote]

I remember your original server about 2-3 years ago, running on a computer with low specs but still hardly any lag due to it being programmed so well :). It was probably the first server with clipped following and functioning sounds for combat etc. I used to play it a lot :P.

Suggestion: Either a 317 or 474 - Try to implement a made-up minigame that would be fun; I’ll try to think of some ;).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Adam:

Good luck. Many have said they would create those and never do.

I’ve been working on this for about three years now, and its going to work perfectly.

Also, it supports all of the client versions I listed except for 525. I already have the basics for the Duel Arena and Castle Wars done, and I’m finishing those up right now.

item.title: Server Suggestions & Client Version
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

What is the primary reason you play private servers?
A very good programmer makes one or I’m extremely bored.

What makes you decide if you stay on a server, or logout and try another one?
A warm welcome

What is your favorite feature that you have ever seen on a server?
Castle Wars although I haven’t seen it on any

What feature(s) would you like to see added to a server?
Mainly castle wars, clipping via the server, Good combat system

What is your favorite client version? (These include 317, 474, 508, 525, and 562.)
474
